```{r}
#upload datasets

setwd()

streamPulse <- read.csv("20210902_streampulse_synthesis_statset.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")

lui_co2 <- read.csv("co2f.csv", header = TRUE, sep = ",")

#merge datasets based on COMID column

stream_merge <- merge(streamPulse, lui_co2, by = "COMID")

```


